settings.editor: The Ultimate WordPress Theme for Podcasts with Continuous Audio Player

Victor Hedman’s life has been a tale of excess andindulgence. Victor dominated the 2010s producing podcast hits for the new era of listeners. Despite his hardships, Mr. Hedman had one of the most prolific runs of any podcast producer, and he belongs in the conversation with the all time greats. The Crispy Weekly Podcast is a gemrock show.
